0P000125VH.HK.long_name: Sun Life MPF Comprehensive Scheme US & Hong Kong Equity Portfolio
0P000125VH.HK.summary: to achieve long term capital appreciation. It is intended that, through its investments in APIFs and/or approved ITCISs, the US & Hong Kong Equity Portfolio will invest in securities of companies listed in the US and/or Hong Kong Stock Exchanges. Whilst US & Hong Kong Equity Portfolio may invest in approved ITCISs, it is not an index tracking fund. It should be noted that the manager(s) of the approved ITCISs and the trustee(s) of the approved ITCISs are mutually independent and are independent of the provider of the relevant indices.
